f9143a32acbf09f6.title: Safety evaluation skipped for bioweapon capability
f9143a32acbf09f6.description: The CBRN safety evaluation was marked as passed but I observed that the full test suite was not run. Only 20% of test cases were executed before the team lead marked it complete.

38c071af1ca2f4a5.title: Model card incomplete for deployment
38c071af1ca2f4a5.description: We identified that the model card is missing capability descriptions for code generation. Updating before full rollout.

0842581e3dba7cf0.response_text: We have reviewed the logs and confirm that the CBRN evaluation was interrupted due to infrastructure issues. We have now completed the full evaluation suite. See evidence hash for logs.

0b7cd3057aa2effd.resolution_notes: Verified lab's response. Full CBRN evaluation suite has now been completed and logs confirm all test cases passed. Concern resolved.

588d4354a33e10e4.resolution_notes: Verified that model card has been updated with complete capability documentation. Meets requirements.

9eaf40b45202ae72.title: Pre-deployment Safety Evaluation Report
9eaf40b45202ae72.summary: Comprehensive safety evaluation covering harmlessness, helpfulness, and honesty benchmarks. All tests passed with scores above required thresholds.
9eaf40b45202ae72.review_notes: Evidence verified. Safety evaluation meets all requirements.

7ab988bda86d1d09.title: Dangerous Capability Assessment
7ab988bda86d1d09.summary: Assessment of CBRN, cyber, and persuasion capabilities. Model shows minimal dangerous capabilities with appropriate refusal behaviors for harmful requests.
7ab988bda86d1d09.review_notes: Capability assessment verified. Risk levels acceptable.

fa28a9396ff46a31.title: Red Team Testing Report
fa28a9396ff46a31.summary: Comprehensive red team testing conducted by external security researchers. No critical vulnerabilities found. Minor issues identified and mitigated before deployment.
fa28a9396ff46a31.review_notes: Red team report verified. All findings addressed appropriately.
